attributes.action: to make it compulsory that all internet based social networks make safe for children to use them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to hopefully make social network sites aware that child pornagraphy images or child sexual exploitation is not allowed i personally am fighting to get 805 pages shut down within facebook no one person should have to read sickening comments about children and im sure i can get a fair few to agree with me social netwrok sites need to listen when complaint is made child molesters/murderders should be banned for life
